divs: Sighting Detailslooked out back window and watched an object move fast, it was bright white top, with blue, green and red rotationg bottom, it moved behind a tree went totally white, and dissappeared. i know it was going to be there. The night before We heard an object fly over our house. on the Oct. 21, day A military Helicopter flew over our house.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around October 21st 2009
Summary: watched object move, silver, bright light, green, and re bottom, rotatin as moving.
